Player History
Drafted in 9th round, 255th overall pick, by Cleveland in 2010...
Traded from Cleveland to Milwaukee on 5/15/2013 (Going to MIL: 3B E. Holland. Going to CLE: 1B T. Conde)...
Traded from Milwaukee to Los Angeles (N) on 6/23/2013 (Going to LAN: CF S. Victorino, 3B E. Holland, P L. Hackman, P L. Prokopec, P S. Pomeranz. Going to MIL: P B. Neal, RF L. Saturria)...
Traded from Los Angeles (N) to Chicago (A) on 4/15/2014 (Going to CHA: CF C. Coghlan, 3B E. Holland. Going to LAN: CF N. Weglarz)...
Had first career hit on 4/7/2015, off Aaron Laffey (KCA)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/29/2015, off David Huff (SEA)...
Injured on 5/20/2017 with a Bruised Wrist, out for one week...
Traded from Chicago (A) to Tampa Bay on 6/9/2017 (Going to CHA: P G. Moscoso, P S. Sherlock, RF T. Tulowitzki. Going to TB: 3B E. Holland, P H. Ambriz)...
Released by Tampa Bay on 6/16/2020...
Signed as a free agent by Toronto on 6/16/2020 to a 1-year deal worth $300,000 per year...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Cleveland on 9/25/2020...
Traded from Toronto to Chicago (N) on 6/26/2022 (Going to CHN: 3B E. Holland. Going to TOR: P J. Shirk, SS F. Herrera)...
Injured on 9/27/2023 with a Torn Back Muscle, out for full season...
